title: Adderall In Verse
author: Rachel
citation: Rachel. "Adderall In Verse: experience with Amphetamines (Adderall) (ID 65672)". Erowid.org. Sep 10, 2007. erowid.org/exp/65672
footer:

[ Switch Colors ]
report:
Adderall has taken away my soul

I felt so brilliant at first

Capable of anything

I could just go

and go

and do

so much

people were envious of me

because I never stopped

never crashed

ever

And my drive

my drive

I had such discipline

I was strong

focused

dedicated

confident

and I was so

so

so

alive

everything that came out of me was golden

Crisp.

Clean.

Sharp.

Perfect.

I felt success

It was coming

out of my pores

surrounding everything I did

I was absolutely glowing.

But now Im just numb

Stuck

Hollow

I cant finish a feeling

My thoughts stop and start

and I dont really remember who I am

anymore.
